sentence.Network_en: The mosaics were sent to Munich, and thence to Geneva.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些马赛克被送到慕尼黑，从那里又送到日内瓦。

sentence.Network_en: They made their way from Spain to France and thence to England.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们从西班牙去了法国，再从那里去了英格兰。

sentence.Network_en: He was very old, and thence very weak.
sentence.Network_cn: 他年纪很老, 因而身体很弱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... then 当时 thence 从此 theological 神学的.
[第二章][计算机寓言——信息时代的启示] ... worship 崇敬 thence 从那里；因此 torture 拷问；折磨.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... twice 二次 thence 自那里，从那时起 thrice 三次.

list.abs: And Isaac departed thence , and encamped in the valley of Gerar , and dwelt there ., 于是 , 以撒离开那地方 , 到基拉耳谷 , 在那里扎营 , 住了一段时间.
He went to London , and thence to Paris ., 他到伦敦 , 从那里再去巴黎.
英语补助词_股票大鳄_新浪博客 ... thence 这下子 thence forward 自始 more or less simultaneously 几乎同时.
You don ' t study hard , thence no good mark ., 你不努力学习 , 因而没有好分数.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English thennes, from earlier thenne (from Old English thanon, of West Germanic origin) + -s (later respelled -ce to denote the unvoiced sound)

entry.def: Thence means from a particular place, especially when you are giving directions about how to get somewhere.

example.ex: I ran straight up to Columbia County, then turned East, came down the Harlem Valley and thence home...
example.tran: 我一直跑到哥伦比亚县，然后向东转，沿着哈勒姆山谷，从那里回到家。

example.ex: The mosaics were sent to Munich, and thence to Geneva.
example.tran: 那些马赛克被送到慕尼黑，从那里又送到日内瓦。

entry.tran: 然后，接着（指状态的变化）
entry.def: Thence is used to say that something changes from one state or condition to another.

example.ex: ...the conversion of sunlight into heat and thence into electricity.
example.tran: 将太阳能转化成热能，然后再转化成电能

means.word_mean: 1. from that place or from there;

sentences.sentence: "flew to Helsinki and thence to Moscow"
"atomic formulas and all compounds thence constructible"- W.V.Quine
"public interest and a policy deriving therefrom"

means.word_mean: 3. (used to introduce a logical conclusion) from that fact or reason or as a result;

sentences.sentence: "the eggs were fresh and hence satisfactory"
"it is late and thus we must go"
"the witness is biased and so cannot be trusted"

auth_sentence.content: The starry strain of spirit, thence we are.

auth_sentence.content: Who stooping op'nd my left side, and took From thence a Rib.
auth_sentence.res_content: Who stooping op'nd my left side, and took From thence a Rib.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Who stooping op'nd my left side, and took From thence a Rib.

sentences.en: We made our way to the coast and thence by sea to France.
sentences.cn: 我们先到海边,再从那里乘船去法国。

sentences.en: He was very old,and thence very weak.
sentences.cn: 他年纪很老，因而身体很弱。
